company-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
company-name.maxlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters
company-name.minlength: Company name must be between 2 and 200 characters

name-of-responsible-person.required: Enter the name of the person who will be responsible for the licence
name-of-responsible-person.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
name-of-responsible-person.maxlength: Name of the responsible person must between 3 and 200 characters
name-of-responsible-person.minlength: Name of the responsible person must between 3 and 200 characters

company-number.companyNumber: Enter a real company number, like 16850062

telephone.ukPhoneNumber: Enter a UK telephone number in the correct format, like 01632 960001 or +44 808 157 0192

website-url.maxlength: Website URL must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-address-line-1.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-address-line-1.maxlength: Address line 1 must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-address-line-2.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-address-line-2.maxlength: Address line 2 must be between 1 and 250 characters

licence-holder-town-or-city.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
licence-holder-town-or-city.maxlength: Town or city must be between 1 and 250 characters

registered-charity.required: Select if the business is a registered charity

legal-identity-changed.required: Select if your legal identity has changed in the last 3 years

previously-held-licence.required: Select if you held a controlled drugs licence under your previous legal identity

previous-licence-number.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
previous-licence-number.minlength: Previous licence number must be between 3 and 50 characters
previous-licence-number.maxlength: Previous licence number must be between 3 and 50 characters

previous-licence-holder-name.required: Enter the name of the company that held the previous licence
previous-licence-holder-name.notUrl: Your answer must not contain URLs or links
previous-licence-holder-name.minlength: Previous licence holder name must be between 2 and 250 characters
previous-licence-holder-name.maxlength: Previous licence holder name must be between 2 and 250 characters

previous-licence-date-of-issue.required: Enter the date the previous licence was issued
previous-licence-date-of-issue.before: Date the previous licence was issued must be in the past
previous-licence-date-of-issue.after: Date when the previous licence was issued must be within the last 100 years
